=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Airplane!
Review Date: 2016/06/06
Categories: Comedy, Nail-Biting, Strange, Understated
Product Description: ['After the pilots of a commercial airline fall sick, a man who is afraid of flying must ensure that the plane lands safely.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jim Abrahams', 'David Zucker', 'Jerry Zucker'], 'Producers': ['Jon Davison', 'Howard W. Koch Jr.', 'Howard W. Koch'], 'Starring': ['Robert Hays', 'Julie Hagerty', 'Leslie Nielson']}
Review Text: What can I say, it's Airplane!  One of the funniest corny comedies ever made.  It's a must see!
Review Title: Hillarious
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Klein', 'Phil Churchward', 'Nigel Simpkiss', 'Richard Heeley', 'James Bryce', 'Andrew Fettis', 'Owen Trevor', 'Mark McQueen', 'Jon Richards', 'Konrad Begg'], 'Producers': ['Andy Wilman'], 'Starring': ['Jeremy Clarkson', 'Richard Hammond', 'James May'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} I really enjoy this program. As always, the quality and speed from Amazon is awesome. If you're a top gear fan, this is a must see! This particular episode was hilarious. Great program {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Scanlon'], 'Producers': ['Kori Rae'], 'Starring': ['Billy Crystal', 'John Goodman', 'Steve Buscemi'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']} It was good, not as good as the first Monsters Inc., movie, but good. The movie is entirely placed when the monsters were in school. The quality is awesome and it's worth watching, but be prepared for an understated plot. I would like to have seen more ties to their work after school and getting hired. This flew by in about a 30 second window in this movie. Not as good as the first one... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Matthew Vaughn'], 'Producers': ['Stephen Marks', 'Peter Morton', 'David Womark', 'Matthew Vaughn', 'Lorenzo Di Bonaventura', 'Michael Dreyer', 'Neil Gaiman'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', 'Charlie Cox', 'Sienna Miller']} I enjoyed the setting and plot of this movie. Of course, in the end, we knew the hero would make it. There were some other surprising plot twists that I hadn't expected. It was an enjoyable find.

If you like movies that contain magic, witches, and some humor, you will probably enjoy this movie. Surprisingly good find.... Mighty Ships Documentary, Special Interest ['These massive, high-tech vessels prove to the world each day that sometimes bigger is indeed better.'] {'Subtitles': ['None available']} This really had a lot of fun information. I enjoyed watching it. If you want to know about ships and how things work, this is a great series! Good information and fun to watch! C.H.i.P.s. Adventure, Action ['Get your motor running ... head out on the highway ... and gear up for\'70s-era action adventures with CHiPs! Starring Erik Estrada and Larry Wilcox as California Highway Patrol officers Frank "Ponch" Poncharello and Jonathan "Jon" Baker, this high-speed series features these chopper coppers as they ride the L.A. freeways, chase down criminals and still find time to unwind with laughs and good times.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Phil Bondelli', 'John Florea', 'Gordon Hessler', 'Barry Crane', 'Leslie H. Martinson', 'Don Weis', 'Charles Bail', 'Michael Caffey', 'Bruce Kessler', 'Georg Fenady'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Larry Wilcox', 'Erik Estrada', 'Robert Pine']} I've always been a big fan of CHiPS. To get to see it in high-def has been awesome and I've enjoyed it on Amazon. You can get the DVD a little cheaper than the streaming, but if you want HD, this is the only way to get it! Definitely recommend it! Great quality, one of my all-time favorite classics! Airplane! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to maintain a preference for high-definition releases in animated and imaginative programming, while also celebrating nostalgia for classic series. Their recent interaction highlights their appreciation for humor-driven narratives, particularly in classic comedies.

- **Genre Inclination:** The user remains focused on adventure, fantasy, comedy, and action content that boasts engaging storytelling. Their recent engagement illustrates a strong affinity for laugh-out-loud humor within familiar formats.

- **Quality Appreciation:** With an average rating of 4.8 and a recent perfect score of 5.0, the user exemplifies a commitment to high production quality and entertaining narratives, underscoring their dedication to well-crafted media.

- **Rating Trend:** The user has shown resilience in their rating practices, regaining favorable momentum by prioritizing captivating and quality viewing experiences, confirming their established standards for media consumption.

- **Language and Accessibility:** The user's commitment to English-language media remains, with a preference for content featuring subtitles, emphasizing their value for accessibility.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** The user maintains awareness of content advisory labels, demonstrating a conscientious approach to media consumption related to sensitive themes.

In summary, the user actively seeks high-quality, entertaining content that balances nostalgia with modern storytelling, reflecting their passion for diverse narratives infused with humor and engaging cinematography.
